snippet: A report on the international travel industry has ranked Egypt the least safe of 140 tourist destinations, evidence of the toll that unrest has taken on the country’s tourist industry.
abstract: World Economic Forum releases report on international travel industry ranking Egypt as least safe and secure of 140 tourist destinations.
lead_paragraph: A report on the international travel industry has ranked Egypt the least safe of 140 tourist destinations, evidence of the toll that unrest has taken on the country’s tourist industry.

headline.main: Egypt: Last Place on Tourism List
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Last Place on Tourism List

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
